If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. Týmuj is an app for easy organisation and communication in sports teams and groups. Suitable for any sport. Managers, leaders or coaches can easily manage their teams directly from their mobile phones. The application can be used in combination with the web platform available at www.tymuj.cz.
 
MULTIPLE TEAMS WITHIN SINGLE ACCOUNT
Sports organisers can create any number of teams and control them from a single account in the application. Likewise, athletes can have all their activities in one place. Regular members can be made into team managers and given the right to create events, invite new members, etc.

TEAM LINE-UP
You can see all team members in one place, including their profile information. The number of team members is not limited. Optional fields can be set for each team, such as the player´s post or jersey number.
Send an invitation to the team easily by e-mail, via SMS or, for example, Whatsapp. New members can either only be invited to the team, or they can be invited directly to participate in existing scheduled events. In a team, you can also restrict the display of some details to its members and increase the feeling of privacy.

SUBGROUPS
You have the option of creating subgroups (for example, A team and B team or field players and goalkeepers) within the list of members and planning events for them separately or setting a separate participation limit for them.
 
TRAININGS AND MATCHES AT A GLANCE
If you are a coach or manager, you can easily plan events and invite players or teammates directly from your mobile.
As a member of the team, you will quickly learn when and where you play or train. You are receiving up-to-date information on whether the event capacity is already full or if the event has been cancelled for some reason. You can save each event to your calendar on your mobile phone.
 
ATTENDANCE
You will confirm your participation in the event within a few seconds. With mobile attendance, team leaders will know in time who they can count on and who is skipping this time and why. You can also assign non-team members to events. If the event is full, the applicant can join the queue and will be informed if the place becomes available. You can easily find out who you can rely on based on the statistics.
 
NOTIFICATION
The notification system speeds up the response to new events in the team. The invitation to the event, created by the captain, will come to everyone on time. Everyone will also learn about the change or cancellation of the event immediately. No one can make excuses for not knowing about something. Choose for yourself whether you want to receive notifications directly to your mobile phone or by e-mail.

NOTICE-BOARD
Write and share important articles, information or instructions for the team. Add files or create a quick poll, so you know what new colour of jerseys the team prefers.

TEAM CHAT AND CHAT FOR EVENTS
You can discuss everything important in one place. Let team members know about new messages with the notification system.
You can use a separate chat for each match or training. You can agree, for example, who takes the car or what the tactics will be.

GALLERY
A gallery is available for each team, in which they simply create albums and upload photos from matches or camps.

WALLET
In the wallet module, you can easily create payment requests for membership fees or for the gym. You will have a clear record of payments and you will see who owes or how much is left in the team wallet.

PARTICIPATION STATISTICS
The application automatically calculates and visualizes the trend of participation in the last 20 events to which the user has been invited. It is possible to distinguish between overall and team-specific statistics.

LANGUAGE MUTATIONS
Týmuj is now available in Czech, Slovakian and English. Other languages ​​will follow.

The soccer referee app that combines timer, notebook and performance tracking into a single, easy-to-use app, which you can use on your smartwatch or phone, letting you concentrate on the match.

REFSIX Features:
- Add matches and rosters on your iPhone
- Create matches for 5-a-side to 11-a-side football

- Select if the match has extra time or penalties
- Create templates of matches for different competitions
- Add lineups for the game
- Record match incidents in game on your smartwatch or phone

- Continuous timer, additional time timer and half time timer
- Record injury time with a tap of the screen
- Optionally record goal scorers
- See all match incidents on your phone after the match
- See your total distance covered
- Track your fitness through the Apple Health and Activity apps

Referee’s Process
- When you receive your matches you can add them into the iPhone app
- On match day, select the match, add rosters and send to your smartwatch or phone
- During the match you can record all of the key match incidents including goals, cards and substitutions as well as track the game time and injury time
- After the match you can view a match report on your phone
- The results page automatically updates giving you a running record of all of your matches

REFSIX PRO is the advanced version of REFSIX that gives you enhanced analysis of your performance with the ability to see: 
- Your positioning on a heatmap
- The location of your cards on the pitch
- Your heart rate through the match
- The distance covered in each half as well as every 5 minutes
- View distance of walking, running, jogging and sprinting
- View season and career statistics screen including average cards given per match

REFSIX PRO also gives you even more functionality.  With REFSIX PRO you'll get every feature in the free tier as well as the ability to:

REFSIX PRO is available with a monthly or annual subscription (price available in-app). You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost. 

Terms of service: https://refsix.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy policy: https://refsix.com/terms-conditions-1/

FAQs
+ Can I use REFSIX without a smartwatch?
Yes, you can use your phone in a match if you don’t have a compatible smartwatch.

+ Do I need my phone with me while refereeing a match if I’m using a smartwatch?
No, we’ve designed the app to work in such a way you only need your smartwatch with you on the pitch. You can sync data between your iPhone and smartwatch before and after the match.

+ Do I need access to wi-fi or an internet connection?
No, on match day no internet connection is necessary. 

+ What if I don't receive teamsheets before a game?
No problem, you can simply select player numbers without player names.

Gymborg Boxing Timer is a round timer designed for training in any round sport such as Boxing Martial Arts, Wrestling, Mixed Martial Arts (MMA), Muay Thai, Kick Boxing, BJJ, Yoga or for any other round timer needs. It’s simple, modern and effective and works well also for HIIT trainings like TABATA, CrossFit.

Use it whenever you want, wherever you are for boxing training, MMA, HIIT, Tabata, Yoga, Muay Thai, BJJ, Kick Boxing, Superset, Inverval Training or any other sport requiring rounds or intervals.

Features:
- Easy-to-config multiple profiles
- Round end, break end warning
- Inner round alert
- Customizable warm up time
- Always On mode (adjustable).
- Playing music and training with Gymborg Boxing Timer at the same time
- Color code for Warm Up, Fight, Break or customise as you want
- Round intervals can be change
- Create custom profiles to suit your need
- Create each profile for each different sport
- Mute the app if you want it
- Create alarms to remind you in app
